title: UCI Fines Unzipped Del Toro, Philipsen Confirms Milan-San Remo, Lamperti Podiums in Season Debut
content:
UPDATED: Belgian ace confirms he will race Milan-San Remo, rising American classics star debuts with a bang, and social media flogs the UCI over fine for Del Toro.

Read the full article at UCI Fines Unzipped Del Toro, Philipsen Confirms Milan-San Remo, Lamperti Podiums in Season Debut on Velo.
author: ahood
